item.title: An API Journey, from Mock to Deployment!
item.description: As API are now becoming mainstream, a lot of focus is put on development and API Gateways. However, this does not solve all the problems… People are still facing issues regarding versioning, pragmatic usage of contract-first approaches or governance! In order to be truly efficient delivering API, it’s the whole lifecycle that needs to be considered. In this hands-on lab, we’ll go through Red Hat’s approach for API development.
